00030 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00031 {
00032   try {
00033     cuda_mutex::get().unlock();
00034     boost::interprocess::scoped_lock<cuda_mutex::mutex_type> lock(cuda_mutex::get());
00035     std::cout << "locked" << std::endl;
00036   } catch (...) {
00037     std::cout << "XXX\n";
